nodes.bodyText: I think the equals and hashcode are incorrect and need to better identify equality.
Why? No point doing the call to super - it's just Object, unless you're saying there's a proxy we need to account for? Calling super on an AOP generated proxy.
Do you mean the original code was bad, too?
Fixed it. Took the list out.
Lets sort these alphabetically since were refactoring it!!!!!
